Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item holds significant value to us and we believe it could be a great addition to your collection or business. Considering its exceptional quality and rarity, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12000. We understand that the true worth might vary depending on your needs and expectations, but we are confident that this offer presents a fantastic opportunity for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
